name: Soul Pusher
description:
A Sokoban-like pushing casual puzzle game with two characters: the angel, who does whatever you command, and the devil, who is evil and therefore does the opposite. Between them, they must push the good souls (blue) to the clouds and the bad souls (red) to the fires. They can only push one soul (each) at a time, and each being can only push the souls that align with it - the angel can't push bad souls, and the devil can't push good souls.

Made for A Simply Puzzling Game Jam #2.
